description:
Sina Weibo is a "visual" micro-blogging service which cleverly integrates pictures and videos, enabling you to quickly view updates about friends and topics that interest you without having to waste time scanning through screens of endless text. 

- Easily share ideas, personal updates and news including videos and pictures. 
- Keep up to date with the latest global news, topics, pictures and videos, and easily repost those you like with the handy repost function. 
- Update your status and upload photos directly from your phone so that your followers can see what you are up to in real time. 

- Revolutionary location based services (LBS) allow you to view posts by others in your vicinity, opening your world to interesting attractions and shops that you never knew existed. 

- Threaded messages help you easily read and reply to specific comments from friends and followers. 
- Easily and quickly follow the status of friends and other people you are interested in, such as prominent members of society. 
- Make groups of the people you follow (such as friends, classmates and colleagues) in order easily sort the information you wish to view. 
- Send private messages to individual friends and followers. 

- Purchase Weibo membership by iAP
- Two methods to buy Weibo membership
   12 RMB per month with auto-renew 
   108 RMB per year with auto-renew (25% off) 
- Payment Description
   Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
    Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
   Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
    No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period
- Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
http://m.weibo.cn/page/646?entry=client

Let's have a good time on Sina Weibo!
releaseNotes:
1.Native iPhone 6/6+ screen size support
2.Stability improvements and bug fixes
